lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Even though I am unemployed I manage to hand out anything I can when asked for help. Unfortunately I have been without work now for over 6 months and have placed 100's of applications. Still nothing. I am a single father of 3 boys and it has been very tough. I have not gone as far as getting assistance from welfare because I believe there are still people out there in worse situations. It has been, like I said before very tough. I still hold onto hope, faith and teach my kids the same. I seen Kiva and i'll say this, Even if I can not get help I know, reading testimonials here that there is still hearts in this world no matter how dark it seems. I have come to grips with despair and I am seeing so much clearer now.
lender.occupational_info: I work as hard as I can with only one thought. It's not what you take with you, it's what you leave behind that makes you who you are.

lender.loan_because:
The Greek word "Eisakouo" can be translated as "to hear and obey" (Vine's Expositionary Dictionary of New Testament Words). Eisakouo Partnership was created as a vehicle for those who desire to respond to God's Word with action!
There will always be poor people in the land. Therefore I command you to be openhanded toward your brothers and toward the poor and needy in your land. Deut 15:11 NIV
Good will come to him who is generous and lends freely, who conducts his affairs with justice. Psalm 112:5 NIV
He who is kind to the poor lends to the LORD, and he will reward him for what he has done. Proverbs 19:17 NIV
May all glory and honor go to the Lord Jesus Christ!

lender.name: Rev Roby
lender.loan_because: As a minister, I know the power of giving. I know that in giving and sharing, greater wealth and joy is enjoyed by all. Tithing is a spiritual principal that is an active practice in my life, both personally and professionally.
lender.occupational_info:
I am the founding minister of of The Celebration Center for Spiritual Living. I have been committed to my pursuit of spiritual studies and have been an avid student of Science of Mind since 1982. I was licensed and ordained as a Minister within the International Centers for Spiritual Living in September 2001 and later received my Docorate of Divinity in 2008. I also have a passion for the performing arts; performing and teaching for many years. My love of the arts and spiritual teachings have merged together to create The Celebration Center for Spiritual Living.
The Celebration Center is located in San Diego, California, USA. We are a small, growing, and very caring spiritual community. Once a month we feature a local non-profit organization at our Sunday Services through our "The Celebration Center Cares" Program. 10% of our monthly offering is then in turn donated to that charity. Once a year, we donate to a non-local charity. This year our chosen charity is Kiva. Blessings to all.

lender.occupational_info: Dr Chery Disposables- Ok, now from what we could find out about this company, we know they are a new player and have a small product line.Â But this is not a bad thing, since their product fits in Heathrow Scientificsâ racks as well.Â Price is always the product killer, and you know what, they offer their product at very low prices, we happened to get our hands on this one and itâs a clean design.Â When we noticed the 3 rounded corners and 1 square corner, it was obvious that this made it much easier and faster to know which vials where placed in which slots.Â They offered more colors, and could be bought OEM from the Manufacturer.Â Our beef with these guys is Distribution.Â They are not on a lot of the major Distributor sites, but we spoke to the owner, and that will be coming this year.Â We did find a lot of Video Reviews of this product, which means it will soon be in all those little searches we love so dear from google.Â We gave them 5 out of 5.
